thread.title: Lisa Wants Out! Vanderpump Plots Spin-Off Revenge Amid ‘RHOBH’ War
thread.title_full: Lisa Wants Out! Vanderpump Plots Spin-Off Revenge Amid ‘RHOBH’ War

author: James Vituscka
title: Lisa Wants Out! Vanderpump Plots Spin-Off Revenge Amid ‘RHOBH’ War
text:
Feb 21, 2017 @ 6:52AM 
The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills is getting too real for Lisa Vanderpump ! 
The 56-year-old reality star is sick of the never-ending drama this season, and sources exclusively tell RadarOnline.com that now she wants out! 
PHOTOS: ‘RHOBH’ At War! Lisa Vanderpump Reveals Season 7 Secrets 
“Lisa is over all of the fighting going on right now, and has only stayed on the show this long because it gave her a platform to raise awareness for her animal activism causes,” explained the source . 
“But she cannot stand the cattiness, and she really does not care what anyone thinks of her anymore.” 
As fans who watch the show know , the reality TV vixen, restaurant owner and founder of The Vanderpump Pets Foundation is opening up a pet rescue and adoption center in L.A. early next month. 
And according to the source, Vanderpump and hubby Ken Todd , 59, are planning for reality TV cameras to follow their new venture. 
PHOTOS: Fraud, Feuds & Fights — 27 Reality Stars Who Are Out Of Control 
“Lisa is now in late stage talks with the network executives about starting another spinoff reality show, focused on her new pet place,” the source told Radar, adding that she could leave Real Housewives in the dust. “She has gotten so incredibly wealthy off this, but she is tired of the stress that the show causes her.” 
Do you think that Lisa Vanderpump should get a spin-off? Tell us your thoughts.
